task.summary: Default task
Manually add the membership product when a user is imported.
Parse CSV into data suitable for model.
Send new user notification emails, and add default_password_nag because password was transmitted in plain-text.
Add CSV headers
Code format CSV
Check if valid string for datetime, before formatting
Code formatting
Display errors
Fix user importing. Check if we are editing or inserting user during parsing of CSV. Correct user_id, to grab from WP_User object so that if we are updating based on email, we are all good.
Check if errors exist before rendering
Code formatting.
Pass correct value to Coseva::_flushEmptyRow(), because the row wasn't being passed by reference, the flushEmptyRow check was provided the pre-filtered row, and as such didn't properly unset the row.
Check if row is empty() each time a Coseva filter is applied. Solves problem of array indexes not being set when a previous filter already cleared the row.
Remove first error from CSV header
Fix default sorting column.
Fix disappearing metadata by moving update_user_meta() to end of function. No idea why this makes a difference, but somehow the userdata was being overwritten.
Correct sorting when data is numeric.
Correct usage of wildcard searching.
Move List Table to Controller
Clean up documentation, and remove excess.
Move sorting for static columns to WP_User_Query. For dynamically generated data, we fall back to usort.
Properly check if we are using order & orderby, and populate this data into hidden form fields so we can use them while performing a custom search.
Fix bug where couldn't sort and search if the sort column was a different column then the column you were searching on.
Correct documentation.
Add hooks to add new member, when passed create-member query arg
Code formatting, and new function to go from membership status slug to name.
Add ability to manually create memberships from default WP add new user page.
Move membership grade and division to WP_User_Util
Add membership division link
Strip slashes.
Correct email variables.

Refactor so single application action edit, extends single application view. Replace ad hoc metabox functionality with add_meta_box and do_meta_boxes API. Fix bug when editing an application that has parent fields that are different, but single fields are the same.
Fix application form editing when multidimensional arrays of data.
Add more specialized error messages, and migrate existing error message to Notify.
Correct placement of boolean returns during update & inserting users.
While updating users, ensure that the ID field is set. Remove user_email from wp_update_user, since email is also associated with username.
Shrink page selector textbox to normal size.
Add members per page screen option.
Add password nag to members who are manually created.
Move renewal notifications to notifications package, and correct diff ordering.
Use total days for diff, not just days part.
Add different prices for different membership grades.
Added correct membership statuses and divisions.
Add company name to billing address.
Change Stripe payment label to pay now from checkout.
Remove shipping address from confirmation screen.

DateInterval doesn't actually return a negative amount for days, instead we have to check if the invert property is equal to one, which tells us that the days are negative.
DateInterval doesn't actually return a negative amount for days, instead we have to check if the invert property is equal to one, which tells us that the days are negative.

Instead of requiring once in load files, simply instantiate desired objects that follow PSR-4, thus allowing the autoloader to take over. Otherwise, can lead to conflicts where classes are being instantiated twice.
